textPlain: I did not create this article but was intrigued to see an attack vector for the Nostr protocol being highlighted.
I’m confused.What’s the point of the article?How’s the author compromised by the Mossad?What would the attack be?
See also: Zooko's triangle[1], a fundamental limitation and trade-offs for names.[1]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zooko%27s_triangle
